channel.title: Npc talking
channel.description: Ive gone to the NPCHandler and chenged the NPC's text to wyat i wanted cause orignally there was text. I saved it. Compiled. And when i went on my rsps they were saying the same things they said before. Help please

item.title: Npc talking
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

I was implying that the directory isn’t declared in the compiler, as this could be why he’s wondering why it isn’t working after a successful compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talking
item.dc:creator: @razorback razorback
item.description:
@razorback wrote:

He stated in his post that it was successfully compiled. From that criteria, it would be safe to assume that it is not a compiling issue. Unless he has limited knowledge to the extent that he cannot tell if his compiler is working.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talking
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Or obviously not compiled. Is your server packaged?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talking
item.dc:creator: @razorback razorback
item.description:
@razorback wrote:

Do a search of the server directory for what they’re saying. The search will return all files with that text within them. That’s how you know where to change it. Obviously not NPCHandler.

Read full topic
